barista_record.SQL_SELECT: SELECT sfe_womastr.firm_id, sfe_womastr.wo_location, sfe_womastr.wo_no, sfe_womastr.wo_status, sfe_womastr.wo_type, sfc_wotypecd.code_desc, sfe_womastr.wo_category, sfe_womastr.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, sfe_womastr.order_no, sfe_womastr.unit_measure, sfe_womastr.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, sfe_womastr.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, sfe_womastr.opened_date, sfe_womastr.eststt_date, sfe_womastr.estcmp_date, sfe_womastr.act_st_date, sfe_womastr.lstact_date, sfe_womastr.closed_date, sfe_womastr.description_01, sfe_womastr.description_02, sfe_womastr.drawing_no, sfe_womastr.drawing_rev, sfe_womastr.priority, sfe_womastr.sched_flag, sfe_womastr.sch_prod_qty, sfe_womastr.qty_cls_todt, sfe_womastr.cls_cst_todt, sfe_womastr.est_yield[$0a$]FROM sfe_womastr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN sfc_wotypecd ON sfc_wotypecd.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND sfc_wotypecd.record_id_a='A' AND sfc_wotypecd.wo_type=sfe_womastr.wo_type[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custmast ON arm_custmast.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND arm_custmast.customer_id=sfe_womastr.customer_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=sfe_womastr.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=sfe_womastr.item_id[$0a$]

SELECT sfe_womatl.firm_id, sfe_womatl.wo_location, sfe_womatl.wo_no, sfe_womastr.item_id, sfe_womastr.wo_status, sfe_womatl.material_seq, sfe_womatl.internal_seq_no, sfe_womatl.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, sfe_womatl.require_date, sfe_womatl.units, sfe_womatl.unit_cost[$0a$]FROM sfe_womatl[$0a$]LEFT JOIN sfe_womastr ON sfe_womastr.firm_id=sfe_womatl.firm_id AND sfe_womastr.wo_location=sfe_womatl.wo_location AND sfe_womastr.wo_no=sfe_womatl.wo_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=sfe_womatl.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=sfe_womatl.item_id

SELECT sfe_womatl.firm_id, sfe_womatl.wo_location, sfe_womatl.warehouse_id, sfe_womatl.item_id, sfe_womatl.wo_no, sfe_womatl.internal_seq_no, sfe_womatl.line_type, sfe_womastr.wo_type, sfe_womastr.wo_category, sfe_womastr.wo_status, sfe_womastr.drawing_rev AS status, sfe_womastr.eststt_date, sfe_womastr.act_st_date, sfe_womastr.lstact_date, sfe_womastr.estcmp_date, sfe_womastr.item_id AS wo_item, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, sfe_womastr.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, sfe_womastr.order_no, sfe_womatl.total_units, sfe_womatl.units AS issued_units[$0a$]FROM sfe_womatl[$0a$]LEFT JOIN sfe_womastr ON sfe_womastr.firm_id=sfe_womatl.firm_id AND sfe_womastr.wo_location=sfe_womatl.wo_location AND sfe_womastr.wo_no=sfe_womatl.wo_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=sfe_womatl.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=sfe_womastr.item_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custmast ON arm_custmast.firm_id=sfe_womatl.firm_id AND arm_custmast.customer_id=sfe_womastr.customer_id[$0a$]

SELECT sfe_wosubcnt.firm_id, sfe_wosubcnt.wo_location, sfe_wosubcnt.wo_no, sfe_wosubcnt.subcont_seq, sfe_womastr.item_id, sfe_womastr.wo_status, sfe_wosubcnt.internal_seq_no, sfe_wosubcnt.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, sfe_wosubcnt.description, sfe_wosubcnt.po_status, sfe_wosubcnt.po_no, sfe_wosubcnt.line_type, sfe_wosubcnt.require_date, sfe_wosubcnt.units, sfe_wosubcnt.unit_cost, sfe_wosubcnt.lead_time[$0a$]FROM sfe_wosubcnt[$0a$]LEFT JOIN sfe_womastr ON sfe_womastr.firm_id=sfe_wosubcnt.firm_id AND sfe_womastr.wo_location=sfe_wosubcnt.wo_location AND sfe_womastr.wo_no=sfe_wosubcnt.wo_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendmast ON apm_vendmast.firm_id=sfe_wosubcnt.firm_id AND apm_vendmast.vendor_id=sfe_wosubcnt.vendor_id

SELECT poe_pohdr.firm_id, poe_pohdr.po_no, poe_pohdr.vendor_id, poe_podet.po_line_no, poe_podet.reqd_date, sfe_womastr.wo_no, poe_podet.wk_ord_seq_ref, sfe_womastr.wo_location, sfe_womastr.wo_type, sfe_womastr.forecast AS wo_status, sfe_womastr.act_st_date, sfe_womatl.require_date, sfe_womastr.lstact_date, ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, poe_podet.item_id, poe_podet.order_memo AS item_desc, poe_podet.po_line_code, poe_podet.unit_measure, sfe_womastr.forecast AS mat_sub, poe_podet.qty_ordered, poe_podet.qty_received[$0a$]FROM poe_pohdr [$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_podet ON poe_podet.firm_id=poe_pohdr.firm_id AND poe_podet.po_no=poe_pohdr.po_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN sfe_womastr ON sfe_womastr.firm_id=poe_pohdr.firm_id AND sfe_womastr.wo_location=' ' AND sfe_womastr.wo_no=poe_podet.wo_no [$0a$]LEFT JOIN sfe_womatl ON sfe_womatl.firm_id=poe_pohdr.firm_id AND sfe_womatl.wo_location=sfe_womastr.wo_location[$0a$]AND sfe_womatl.wo_no=poe_podet.wo_no AND sfe_womatl.internal_seq_no=poe_podet.wk_ord_seq_ref [$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=poe_pohdr.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=poe_podet.warehouse_id[$0a$][$0a$]
